snp1.9:15.3: the sage meditating alone in the forest,

snp1.9:21.1: “The world has five kinds of sensual stimulation,
snp1.9:21.2: and the mind is said to be the sixth.
snp1.9:21.3: When you’ve discarded desire for these,
snp1.9:22.1: This is the exit from the world,
snp1.9:22.2: explained in accord with the truth.

snp1.9:24.1: “Someone who is always endowed with ethics,
snp1.9:24.4: crosses the flood so hard to cross.
snp1.9:25.1: Someone who desists from sensual perception,
snp1.9:25.3: and has ended relish for rebirth,
snp1.9:25.4: does not sink in the deep.”
snp1.9:26.1: “Behold him of wisdom deep <j>who sees the subtle meaning,
snp1.9:26.2: who has nothing, unattached to sensual life,
snp1.9:26.4: the great seer treading the holy road.
snp1.9:27.1: Behold him of peerless name <j>who sees the subtle meaning,
snp1.9:27.2: giver of wisdom, <j>unattached to the realm of sensuality:
snp1.9:27.3: see him, the all-knower, so very intelligent,
snp1.9:27.4: the great seer treading the noble road.”
snp1.9:28.1: “It was a fine sight for us today,
snp1.9:28.2: a good dawn, a good rising,
snp1.9:28.4: the undefiled one who has crossed the flood.
snp1.9:29.3: all go to you for refuge,
